news-feet.imageCaption: Gasoline prices may soon dip below
news-feet.heading: Don't look now: $1 gas may be close
news-feet.shortinfo: Gasoline prices may soon dip below $1 per gallon at some stations in the Midwest, putting the price of unleaded fuel in the same category as a pack of gum or a bag of pretzels from the vending machine.
